meanings.sent1: The seedier part of town had old, crumbling buildings.
meanings.sent2: The motel on the outskirts looked seedier than the fancy hotel downtown.
meanings.sent3: The seedier alleyway made the detective chuckle as he searched for clues.
meanings.sent4: The seedier side of the city whispered stories of forgotten dreams and lost hopes.
meanings.sent5: The seedier neighborhoods painted a picture of neglect and decay.

meanings.sent1: The seedier characters in the story were always up to no good.
meanings.sent2: The politician's involvement in the scandal made his reputation even seedier.
meanings.sent3: The seedier behavior of the villains added a touch of drama to the movie.
meanings.sent4: The seedier side of human nature revealed itself in the dark alleys of the city.
meanings.sent5: The seedier aspects of society cast a shadow on the community's values.
